artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: two level rectangular building with green roof and trim; terrace on second level; above door in oval shape "·T·E·A·"; on facade of lower level at center "RESTAURANT"; doors at corners of lower level; walled lower terrace with black and white diamond pattern floor
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [RESTAURANT-THÉ]
title: Restaurant - Thé, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
